## Aspect() function

Aspect decorator for AOP implementation. Used to mark a class as an Aspect PointCut in the AOP system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function Aspect(identifier?: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

identifier


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional custom identifier for the Aspect class


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

ClassDecorator

{<!-- -->ClassDecorator<!-- -->} Class decorator function

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} When class name doesn't end with 'Aspect' suffix

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} When class doesn't implement 'run' method

## Example


```typescript
@Aspect()
class LoggingAspect {
  run() {
    // aspect implementation
  }
}
```
